roleset.name: set a price, value
roleset.note: APPRAISE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'appraise' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 54.4. (from appraise.01-v)
APPRAISAL-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb appraise.01, OntoNotes grouping appraisal-n sense 1; maps to VN classes assessment-34.1 and price-54.4. Framed by Claire. (from appraisal.01-n)

example.name: surprised this didn't occur
example.text: Mary appraised the value of John's home at $3.14.

example.name: Arg 1 and TMP
example.text: Firms are offering prepurchase house appraisals to deter overpaying.

example.name: Arg 1 and MNR
example.text: The antique experts had a harsh appraisal of the value of my lunchbox collection.
example.arg: of the value of my lunchbox collection.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: Mary's $279,000 appraisal of the house was reasonable.

roleset.name: come to understand
roleset.note: APPRAISE-V NOTES: No relevant VN entry. Misuse of apprise?? (from appraise.02-v)

example.name: the one example
example.text: But [institutional investors]*-1 may wait a little longer [*-1]to appraise the direction of the U.S. monetary policy and the dollar, traders said.
example.arg: the direction of the U.S. monetary policy and the dollar
